events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and I am quite disappointed with the sizing.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the product fit.
The case has been assigned to a customer support representative specialized in refunds.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that didnâ€™t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been worn or washed?
My order number is 4589231. The jacket has not been worn or washed. I simply tried it on but it was too small.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately once you send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will provide.
That sounds great, thank you. Please send the return label and I will ship the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have emailed you the prepaid return shipping label. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to ensure you have received the return label and to check if you need any further assistance with your refund.
The refund has been successfully processed and the case is now closed. Please contact us if you need help in the future.
